questionText.text:
Consider the following Schema and reduce them to all normal forms.
Movie (mID, title, year, director, rid, name, stars, ratingDate)
mID - movie ID
Title - Title of the movie
Year- movie release year
Director- movie director
Rid - reviewer Id
Name - reviewer name
Stars- stars from the reviewer for the movie
ratingDate - Date of the movie rated

PLEASE SUBMIT THE FILE
